item.title: Report E-2024120449
item.description:
Report E-2024120449

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-17
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (XKC) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to a forklift accident, a 55-gallon poly drum was knocked over and released approximately 2 quarts of UN1903 ChemSan 1400. XPO stated that the released product was contained to the dock floor at door #103. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the terminal, who turned down contractor assistance. Terminal personnel donned PPE and contained and cleaned the release. The drum was up-righted and the lid of the drum was re-secured for the drums continued shipmen on. The impacted absorbents used to clean the spill were containerized into a 10-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report E-2024120442
item.description:
Report E-2024120442

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-27
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1445ET, with XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release located at terminal XKC in Kansas City, KS. It was reported that approximately 1-2 ounces of Master Pro Refinishing Wax and Grease Remover released from (1) 5-gallon metal bucket due to a forklift puncture upon unloading. After obtaining the SDS, ERTS contacted the terminal back and spoke to Roberto Martinez to advise we recommend a contractor due to the SDS calling for tightly fitting goggles, but he reported it was already cleaned up and contained. (1) 10-gallon metal drum contains (1) metal pail of product, spent oil dri, shrink-wrap, and PPE.
